leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 物理仿真-CFD 求解器与湍流生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 网格→求解→模型→后处理→验证→UQ

tools.name: Dymos
tools.one_line_profile: Open source library for optimization of dynamic multidisciplinary systems and trajectories
tools.detailed_description: Dymos is a Python library built on top of OpenMDAO for solving optimal control problems involving multidisciplinary systems. It provides a unified interface for trajectory optimization using collocation and pseudospectral methods.

tools.name: MPhys
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized interface for multiphysics problems within OpenMDAO
tools.detailed_description: MPhys provides a standard interface for coupling physics codes in OpenMDAO, facilitating the creation of multiphysics analysis and optimization problems by defining conventions for data exchange.

tools.name: pyCycle
tools.one_line_profile: Thermodynamic cycle modeling library built on OpenMDAO
tools.detailed_description: pyCycle is a library for modeling thermodynamic cycles, particularly for aircraft engine performance analysis. It leverages OpenMDAO to allow for analytic derivatives and optimization of cycle parameters.

tools.name: Zappy
tools.one_line_profile: Load flow analysis for AC/DC electric systems with analytic derivatives
tools.detailed_description: Zappy is a load flow analysis tool for electric systems implemented in OpenMDAO, providing analytic derivatives to support gradient-based optimization of electrical subsystems.

tools.name: PaddleCFD
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for fluid mechanics surrogate modeling and optimization
tools.detailed_description: PaddleCFD is a toolkit based on PaddlePaddle for applying deep learning to fluid mechanics, including surrogate modeling, equation discovery, shape optimization, and flow control.

tools.name: SAFE-python
tools.one_line_profile: Sensitivity Analysis library for Python (SAFE port)
tools.detailed_description: SAFE-python is a Python port of the SAFE (Sensitivity Analysis for Ecological models) toolbox, providing methods for global sensitivity analysis of model outputs.

tools.name: SALib
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for global sensitivity analysis
tools.detailed_description: SALib provides a collection of methods for global sensitivity analysis, including Sobol, Morris, and FAST methods, to quantify the influence of model inputs on outputs.

tools.name: PolyChaos.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for orthogonal polynomials and polynomial chaos expansions
tools.detailed_description: PolyChaos.jl is a Julia package for constructing orthogonal polynomials and quadrature rules, facilitating Polynomial Chaos Expansion (PCE) for uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: NeuralABM
tools.one_line_profile: Neural parameter calibration for multi-agent models
tools.detailed_description: NeuralABM uses neural networks to estimate marginal densities on parameters for calibrating multi-agent models, facilitating inverse modeling and parameter estimation.

tools.name: FluTO
tools.one_line_profile: Graded Multiscale Fluid Topology Optimization using Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: FluTO is a framework for fluid topology optimization that employs neural networks to handle graded multiscale structures, enabling efficient design of fluidic devices.

tools.name: WISDEM
tools.one_line_profile: Wind Plant Integrated System Design and Engineering Model
tools.detailed_description: WISDEM is a software set for the integrated design and analysis of wind turbines and wind plants. It includes modules for aerodynamics, structure, and cost, wrapped in an optimization framework.

tools.name: emopt
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization suite for shape and topology of electromagnetic structures
tools.detailed_description: emopt is a Python library for the inverse design and optimization of photonic and electromagnetic devices using the adjoint method.

tools.name: BayesFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Amortized Bayesian workflows using generative neural networks
tools.detailed_description: BayesFlow is a Python library for performing amortized Bayesian inference using invertible neural networks, enabling efficient parameter estimation and model comparison for complex scientific models.

tools.name: ImplicitAD.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Adjoint differentiation for implicit functions in Julia
tools.detailed_description: ImplicitAD.jl automates the calculation of steady and unsteady adjoints for implicit functions, supporting forward and reverse mode algorithmic differentiation, useful for gradient-based optimization in physics solvers.

tools.name: OpenMDAO.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia wrapper for the OpenMDAO optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: OpenMDAO.jl provides a Julia interface to the OpenMDAO framework, allowing Julia-based analysis and optimization codes to be integrated into OpenMDAO workflows.

tools.name: CEASIOMpy
tools.one_line_profile: Conceptual aircraft design and optimization environment
tools.detailed_description: CEASIOMpy is a framework for conceptual aircraft design that integrates various tools for aerodynamics, structure, and stability analysis, supporting optimization workflows.

tools.name: GMSH-Airfoil-2D
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating 2D meshes around airfoils using Gmsh
tools.detailed_description: GMSH-Airfoil-2D is a Python utility that automates the generation of 2D structured or unstructured meshes around airfoils using the Gmsh API, facilitating CFD preprocessing.

tools.name: BerkeleyPhotonicInverseDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous adjoint optimization for photonic inverse design
tools.detailed_description: This tool implements continuous adjoint optimization methods for the inverse design of photonic devices, interfacing with Lumerical FDTD solvers.

tools.name: euler2d
tools.one_line_profile: 2-D inviscid flow and adjoint solver on unstructured grids
tools.detailed_description: A finite volume solver for 2D Euler equations on unstructured grids, featuring adjoint capabilities for sensitivity analysis and optimization.

tools.name: dakotathon
tools.one_line_profile: Python API and BMI for the Dakota iterative systems analysis toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper and Basic Model Interface (BMI) for the Dakota toolkit, facilitating the integration of Dakota's optimization and uncertainty quantification capabilities into Python workflows.

tools.name: OpenLEGO
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between AGILE and OpenMDAO for MDO
tools.detailed_description: A tool that provides an open-source link between the AGILE collaborative MDO framework and OpenMDAO, enabling multidisciplinary design optimization workflows.

tools.name: fenics_topopt_foam
tools.one_line_profile: Topology optimization framework combining OpenFOAM and FEniCS
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool that couples OpenFOAM for fluid dynamics and FEniCS (dolfin-adjoint) for sensitivity analysis to perform topology optimization.

tools.name: dolfin-adjoint
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic differentiation tool for FEniCS/Dolfin
tools.detailed_description: A library that automatically derives the discrete adjoint and tangent linear models from a forward model written in the FEniCS/Dolfin framework, enabling efficient sensitivity analysis and optimization.

tools.name: angler
tools.one_line_profile: Frequency-domain photonic simulation and inverse design optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for frequency-domain simulation of linear and nonlinear photonic devices, including adjoint-based inverse design optimization capabilities.

tools.name: savvy
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for high dimensionality sensitivity analysis data
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to visualize and explore high-dimensional sensitivity analysis data, aiding in the interpretation of complex model behaviors.

tools.name: chaospy-attractors
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of chaotic attractor simulations in Python
tools.detailed_description: A library providing implementations of various chaotic attractors (Lorenz, Rossler, etc.) for simulation and visualization purposes.

tools.name: AgentPy
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for agent-based modeling in Python
tools.detailed_description: An open-source framework for the development, simulation, and analysis of agent-based models, suitable for complex systems research.

tools.name: chaospy
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for uncertainty quantification using polynomial chaos expansions
tools.detailed_description: A numerical toolbox for performing uncertainty quantification using polynomial chaos expansions and Monte Carlo integration.

tools.name: DynGFN
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Dynamic Causal Discovery using Generative Flow Networks
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Generative Flow Networks (GFN) for Bayesian dynamic causal discovery, enabling inference of causal structures from data.

tools.name: QUESO
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library for uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: QUESO (Quantification of Uncertainty for Estimation, Simulation and Optimization) is a library designed to support statistical inverse problems and uncertainty quantification in large-scale computational models.

tools.name: QuESo
tools.one_line_profile: Quadrature for Embedded Solids library
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library providing quadrature rules for embedded domain methods (fictitious domain methods) in finite element analysis.

tools.name: OpenAeroStruct
tools.one_line_profile: Aerostructural optimization tool using OpenMDAO
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool that performs aerostructural optimization by coupling a vortex lattice method (VLM) with a 1D finite element structural model within the OpenMDAO framework.

tools.name: ADflow
tools.one_line_profile: RANS solver for gradient-based aerodynamic design optimization
tools.detailed_description: A finite volume RANS solver specifically tailored for gradient-based aerodynamic design optimization, featuring efficient adjoint implementations.

tools.name: DAFoam
tools.one_line_profile: Discrete Adjoint with OpenFOAM for MDO
tools.detailed_description: A derivative of OpenFOAM that implements discrete adjoint solvers to enable high-fidelity multidisciplinary design optimization.

tools.name: UQPCE
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty Quantification using Polynomial Chaos Expansion
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based research code from NASA for uncertainty quantification using non-intrusive polynomial chaos expansion surrogate modeling.

tools.name: BlenderFOAM
tools.one_line_profile: Fluid based shape optimization with Blender and OpenFOAM
tools.detailed_description: A tool that integrates Blender's modeling capabilities with OpenFOAM's CFD solvers to perform fluid-based shape optimization.

tools.name: OpenTURNS
tools.one_line_profile: Library for uncertainty quantification, probabilistic modeling, and statistics
tools.detailed_description: OpenTURNS is a major library for uncertainty treatment, reliability analysis, and sensitivity analysis in scientific simulation.

tools.name: otagrum
tools.one_line_profile: OpenTURNS module for graphical models using aGrUM
tools.detailed_description: A module connecting OpenTURNS with aGrUM to handle Bayesian networks and graphical models within the UQ framework.

tools.name: otfmi
tools.one_line_profile: OpenTURNS module for FMI (Functional Mock-up Interface) model manipulation
tools.detailed_description: Allows the use of FMU (Functional Mock-up Units) models within OpenTURNS for uncertainty quantification of exchanged simulation models.

tools.name: otrobopt
tools.one_line_profile: Robust optimization module for OpenTURNS
tools.detailed_description: Provides algorithms for robust optimization, handling uncertainties within the optimization loop of scientific models.

tools.name: torchcde
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable controlled differential equation solvers for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: Provides GPU-accelerated, differentiable solvers for controlled differential equations, essential for continuous-time modeling and adjoint-based sensitivity analysis.

tools.name: AeroSandbox
tools.one_line_profile: Aircraft design optimization framework with automatic differentiation
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for aircraft design optimization that leverages automatic differentiation for fast gradient-based optimization of aerodynamic and structural models.

tools.name: CreateFFD
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to generate Free-Form Deformation boxes for SU2
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for generating FFD control volumes used in aerodynamic shape optimization with the SU2 solver.

tools.name: preCICE
tools.one_line_profile: Coupling library for partitioned multi-physics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables the coupling of existing single-physics solvers (like CFD and FEA) to perform partitioned multi-physics simulations.

tools.name: su2-adapter
tools.one_line_profile: preCICE adapter for the SU2 CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: The official adapter allowing the SU2 CFD solver to be coupled with other solvers via the preCICE library for multi-physics simulations.

tools.name: CFDTool
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for CFD simulation using OpenFOAM and SU2
tools.detailed_description: A simulation toolbox providing a GUI and workflow for setting up and running CFD simulations with OpenFOAM and SU2 backends.

tools.name: FEATool Multiphysics
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated physics simulation platform for FEA and CFD
tools.detailed_description: A multi-physics simulation platform integrating various solvers (FEniCS, OpenFOAM, SU2) with a unified GUI for modeling and analysis.

tools.name: Distribution System Model Calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithms for calibrating power grid distribution system models
tools.detailed_description: A set of algorithms developed by Sandia National Labs for the calibration of distribution system models, solving inverse problems in power systems.

tools.name: pyapprox
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for high-dimensional approximation and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for high-dimensional function approximation, surrogate modeling, and uncertainty quantification, supporting scientific machine learning workflows.

tools.name: cashocs
tools.one_line_profile: Adjoint-based shape optimization and optimal control software
tools.detailed_description: A software package built on FEniCS for solving shape optimization and optimal control problems using adjoint methods.

tools.name: PhotoAcoustic.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Forward and adjoint photoacoustic operators in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing forward and adjoint operators for photoacoustic imaging, built on the JUDI framework for wave equation solving.

tools.name: Dakota
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for optimization and uncertainty quantification
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit from Sandia National Labs for design optimization, parameter estimation, uncertainty quantification, and sensitivity analysis.

tools.name: SU2 MeshTools
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh generation and manipulation tools for SU2
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for generating and processing computational meshes specifically for the SU2 CFD solver.

tools.name: SU2
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source suite for multiphysics simulation and design
tools.detailed_description: A leading open-source suite for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) and performing PDE-constrained optimization, with a focus on CFD and aerodynamics.

tools.name: WhatsOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Web application for multidisciplinary design analysis and optimization (MDO)
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform designed to define, visualize, and manage Multidisciplinary Design Optimization (MDO) architectures. It serves as an ecosystem around OpenMDAO, allowing users to construct surrogate models, manage variable connections, and execute optimization workflows. Developed by ONERA.

tools.name: openmdao_extensions
tools.one_line_profile: Extensions and solvers for the OpenMDAO optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing additional drivers, solvers, and surrogate model generators for OpenMDAO. It includes implementations for specific optimization strategies like SEGOMOE (Super-Efficient Global Optimization with Mixture of Experts) and other MDO utilities developed by ONERA.
